extension.summary: Toggle Piccap ambient backlight on LG WebOS TVs
extension.description:
Controls the Piccap screen capture service on rooted LG WebOS TVs for use with HyperHDR/Hyperion ambient lighting.
Includes a guided setup wizard that automatically discovers your TV, generates SSH keys, and configures the connection.
Requirements: - Rooted LG WebOS TV with Piccap installed - SSH access enabled on the TV
Getting started: 1. Run the add-on â€” the setup wizard launches automatically on first use 2. Or open Settings > Setup > Run Setup Wizard at any time 3. Optional: Map to a remote button via keymap
Keymap example (save to userdata/keymaps/piccap.xml): <keymap><global><remote> <red>RunScript(script.piccap)</red> </remote></global></keymap>
